titles.title: A bill to amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to provide for protection of recovery rebates.
A bill to amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to provide for protection of recovery rebates.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the attachment of a 2021 recovery rebate by legal process, including assignment, levy, or garnishment. A 2021 recovery rebate is a stimulus payment provided by the American Rescue Plan of 2021 for individual taxpayers and their dependents who have been affected by the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
